name: headwater
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
forming or containing streams that flow into a larger river close to where it starts: Headwater streams contain a variety of unique life forms. the headwater tributaries of the Rio Grande
More examplesFewer examplesOtters have cleaned the fish out of some headwater streams.Several people remembered his visit to their headwater village. Oil spills have dumped over one hundred thousand barrels of oil in headwater rivers.
